DOC.brief_summary: By enabling a partial rebreathing of expired gas, a moderate respiratory acidosis is induced, without causing hypoxia in the patient. Based on the scientific literature on the subject, the study hypothesis is that the fall in body pH will be able to stop and/or prevent epileptic brain activity.
DOC.brief_title: Stopping and Preventing Epileptic Seizures Using a Partial Rebreathing Mask
